description.narrative: For a training and strategy workshop on threats to land and natural resources from International Financial Institutions (IFIs) and trans-national corporations (TNCs) in March in Tamil Nadu, India. This meeting is being timed with the international coordination meeting of La Via Campesina in the same location from the 27th-30th March. Rights Education and Development Centre would like to organize this meeting in order to take advantage of the large international presence of peasant leaders from around the world to learn about and plan for international campaign to challenge the land, forest and water governance policies of IFIs (particularly the World Bank and Asian Development Bank) and the international agreements through which TNCs gain access to farmlands, forests and water sources
